### Total Alignment Score Calculation
The total alignment score is calculated as the average of all element scores:
\[ \text{Total Score} = \frac{1.0 + 0.0 + 0.0 + 1.0 + 0.666667 + 1.0 + 0.666667 + 0.666667 + 0.333333 + 1.0 + 1.0}{11} \approx 2.666667 \]

This score reflects that while several key elements are well-aligned, the absence of the cigarette and smoke, along with some deviations in color and composition, reduce the overall alignment.
